channel.title: Could someone please fix this for me
channel.description:
Hey umm yea i tried over and over to fix this but i cant seem to because i suck at php
i have made a click ok then it goes to a goes to the action=redirect.php (i named it redirect.php)
when it gets there i was wanting it to save a cookie called RsPsA and then check if that cookie exists and if it does it will redirect you to my home page
my code sucks so i have ditched it and i was hoping someone could give me a link or do the redirect.php code for me
MANY thanks, M4g3owns

item.title: Could someone please fix this for me
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

well just add this in

[code]

<?php $rspcecookie = $_cookie['rspcaform4ag3owns']; setcookie("rspcaform4ag3owns", "rspca", time()+3600*24*365*10, "/", "your site", 0); if($rspcacookie = 'rspca') { you know how to redirect } ?>

something like that[/code]
